description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Job summary :
              
              - Conduct internal training on occupational health and safety awareness for employees.
              
              - Follow up and update health & safety compliance profile.
              
              - To implement safety and health procedures and develop internal work procedures to comply with legal obligation.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * Safety Prerequisites Qualifications:
              
              - Hold a valid university / college degree in labor safety field is advantage.
              
              - Hold a valid university / college degree in technical field ( as industrial electricity, mechanic) is advantage.
              
              - Good computer skills.
              

              * Required Skills/ Knowledge:
              
              - Problem solving approach.
              
              - Good communication and presentation skill.
              
              - Training skill.
              

              * Required Work Experience:
              
              - At least 6 months working experience in area of health & safety or CSR/compliance ( Social Labor & C_TPAT) is advantage.
              

              * Required Languages:
              
              - High Proficiency in both English and Vietnamese languages.
              

              * Required Behaviors Competencies:
              
              - Compassionate & empathetic.
              
              - Energetic and self motivated.
              
              - Team work spirit.
              
              - Able to work under pressure.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
